Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at an estimated $12000 to you. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $14000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows me to maintain a competitive edge in the market while securing a satisfactory return on my investment. I believe this offer presents a compelling opportunity for both of us. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
